text.intro:
This network illustrates the network of games by streamers' overlaps in production. 

A node denotes a game, an edge indicates the presence of common streamers broadcasting both games. The size of a node is the number of streamers broadcasting the game. The weight of an edge corresponds to the number of common streamers broadcasting two games. 
The displayed network color-coded nodes for visiability and identification of community clusters.
text.title: Twitch-Content-Production
